div.p: Mobile Savvy, a Telus Authorized Dealer, is one of the largest Telus Dealers in Ontario.
Mobile Savvy has 8 locations to serve you better, located in Hamilton, Mississauga, London, St. Catherines, Niagara Falls and Kitchener.
We are an award-winning Telus dealer, dedicated to providing unique wireless solutions that suit our customer’s needs.

This is achieved through our highly experienced and tech savvy staff, whose #1 goal is to take care of all our customer’s needs. With over 10 years in the telecommunications industry, Mobile Savvy understands how to create personalized solutions to match your needs. We make purchasing wireless products easy and simple.

Mobile Savvy also specializes in building a brilliant digital future for small and enterprise businesses across Canada. But we don’t think of our business customers as customers. We think of each one as a partner.
We pride ourselves on combining service and expertise with innovative products to meet the needs of your business.

Another thing we are really proud of at Mobile Savvy is that we are an inclusive brand. That’s why our multicultural staff is happy to support customers in a variety of languages. We are also highly integrated in the local communities we serve and are dedicated to giving back to serve others.
We have an Omni Channel location strategy which provides our customers the option to purchase products or to get service either in store or online.
Whatever your wireless needs are, we have the right device, with the right plan and the best price.
Visit out locations page to find a location near you or if you have any questions contact us at help@mobilesavvy.ca.

On behalf of the wonderful team at Mobile Savvy, I would like to thank you for visiting our website and stores and most of all, trusting us with your hard-earned business. We are always striving for excellence and welcome your feedback. If you would like to contact us directly regarding your experience with Mobile Savvy, please send us an email at help@mobilesavvy.ca and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

We look forward to hearing from you,
Waleed
